issues.title: Large Quantity of Scrap Materials
issues.description: Scrap cables and metals occupying a significant storage area
issues.description_ar: كابلات ومعادن خردة تشغل مساحة تخزين كبيرة

issues.title: Small and Insecure Locks
issues.description: Existing locks are small in size and not secure
issues.description_ar: الأقفال الموجودة صغيرة الحجم وغير آمنة

issues.title: Main Doors Require Maintenance
issues.description: Main doors need repair and maintenance work

issues.title: Airport Project Materials
issues.description: Numerous boxes of materials from closed Airport project still in storage
issues.description_ar: صناديق كثيرة من مواد مشروع المطار المغلق لا تزال مخزنة

issues.title: Firefighting System Issues
issues.description: Firefighting system has been repaired and is now working properly. Expired fire extinguisher has been replaced. Issue resolved.
issues.description_ar: تم إصلاح نظام الإطفاء وهو يعمل الآن بشكل صحيح. تم استبدال طفاية الحريق المنتهية الصلاحية. تم حل المشكلة.

recommendations: Dispose of accumulated scrap materials (cables and metals)
Replace small locks with heavy-duty security locks
Process and relocate Airport project materials
Fix firefighting system and replace expired extinguishers
source_report: Report on the Visit to the Central Region.docx
